title: Fluffy Philharmonic
description: Formed in 2020, when a group of fluffy musician friends realised there were enough of them to form an orchestra. This diverse and fun-loving group are welcoming of new members and is constantly growing. It is no surprise that a fluffy fan club soon followed, because you don't need to play an instrument to love music.

feed.subtitle: Online home of the Fluffy Philharmonic
